mapper.insert: INSERT INTO User (user_id, password, email, name, register_date, phone, address, company) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{password}, #{email}, #{name}, now(), #{phone, jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{address, jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{company, jdbcType=NVARCHAR} )
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM User where upper(user_id) = upper(#{param1})
SELECT user_id, password, email, name, register_date, phone, address, company FROM User WHERE user_id = #{param1}
mapper.update: UPDATE User SET password = #{password}, email = #{email}, name = #{name}, phone = #{phone}, address = #{address}, company = #{company} WHERE user_id = #{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT user_id, email, name, register_date, phone, address, company, #{tokenId} as token FROM User where user_id = (select user_id from Token where token_id = #{tokenId})
select email , status , activate_key , expire_date , retry_url from Pending where activate_key = #{activateKey}
select email , status , activate_key , expire_date , retry_url from Pending where email = #{param1} order by expire_date desc limit 1
